name: Verify the successful user sign in and assign the token

steps.name: Given  the base_uri of the application
Given  user sends a sign in request with the following data
When  the user sends the post request to "/auth/sign-in" with the request payload
Then  the status code should be 201
And  the response should contain the "Customer" assigned
And  the response should validate the "ValidateSignIn" schema
And  the response should contain the token id of the user based on "Customer"
